domains.name: Navigation
domains.context: NavIC constellation provides complete regional navigation coverage for India and surrounding areas.

domains.name: EarthObservation
domains.context: Cartosat, Resourcesat, Oceansat, and RISAT fleets cover most civilian and defense Earth observation needs.

domains.name: DisasterManagement
domains.context: INSAT weather satellites, RISAT radar, and Cartosat optical satellites provide comprehensive disaster monitoring.

domains.name: Weather
domains.context: INSAT-3D and INSAT-3DR provide primary weather monitoring, with some reliance on international data for global models.

insights: Navigation signals are entirely powered by NavIC constellation, enabling complete independence from foreign GNSS systems.
Earth observation remains a core strength with Cartosat, Resourcesat, Oceansat, and RISAT series covering diverse applications.
Disaster management leverages INSAT weather satellites and RISAT radar imaging for comprehensive monitoring and response.
Weather services primarily use INSAT-3D and INSAT-3DR, with some international data integration for global weather models.
